name: Sneaker Search
description:
In this tycoon game the main objective is to cop all the most coveted grails by scoring them in crates and gaining followers.

Objectives:

- 2 million followers unlocks Tom Sachs Mars Yard

- 5 million followers unlocks Air Mags

- 20 million unlock Air Diors

- Reach 5000 cash earned in the mini game and unlock Chunky Dunkys.

Grind and hustle to buy upgrade and become the ultimate sneakerhead!
